/* ---- Preview controls ---- */
.preview-controls {

.dynamic-page {
  min-height: 100vh;

  overflow: hidden;
}

.gradient-bg {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;

  z-index: -2;
}

@keyframes gradientShift {
  0% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
  50% { background-position: 100% 50%; }
  100% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .gradient-bg {
  background: linear-gradient(-45deg, #eef2f6, #e3e8ef, #dbe4ef, #e5eaf2);

/* Hero Section */
.hero-section-v2 {
  position: relative;
  height: 50vh;
  min-height: 350px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;

}

  position: absolute;
  top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;

}

.hero-image {
  width: 100%; height: 100%;

}

}

.feature-card-v2 {
  position: relative;
  padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
  backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 16px;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #fff;
  transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);
  overflow: hidden;
  cursor: default;
}

.feature-card-v2::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 50%);

}

.feature-card-v2:hover {

  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
  border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  box-shadow: 0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0,0,0,0.4), 0 0 40px rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
  z-index: 10;
}

.feature-card-v2:hover::before { opacity: 1; }

.card-icon {
  width: 48px; height: 48px;
  display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), rgba(255,255,255,0.05));

.feature-card-v2 h3 {

}

.feature-card-v2:hover h3 { transform: translateX(5px); }

.feature-card-v2 p {

}

.feature-card-v2:hover p {

}

body:not(.quarto-dark) .card-icon svg { stroke: #2d5a27; }

/* Particles */
.particles {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%;
  pointer-events: none;
  z-index: -1;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.particle {
  position: absolute;
  width: 10px; height: 10px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: float 20s infinite;
}

.particle:nth-child(1) { left: 10%; animation-delay: 0s; animation-duration: 25s; }
.particle:nth-child(2) { left: 30%; animation-delay: 3s; animation-duration: 20s; }
.particle:nth-child(3) { left: 50%; animation-delay: 6s; animation-duration: 30s; }
.particle:nth-child(4) { left: 70%; animation-delay: 9s; animation-duration: 22s; }
.particle:nth-child(5) { left: 90%; animation-delay: 12s; animation-duration: 28s; }

@keyframes float {
  0%, 100% { transform: translateY(100vh) scale(0); opacity: 0; }
  10% { opacity: 1; }
  90% { opacity: 1; }
  100% { transform: translateY(-100vh) scale(1); opacity: 0; }
}

#quarto-content { padding: 0 !important; }
.dynamic-page + .quarto-title-block, #title-block-header { display: none; }
</style>

<script>
  // Read font choices from URL params
  const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  const headingFont = params.get('h') || 'Space Grotesk';
  const bodyFont = params.get('b') || 'Inter';
  const label = params.get('label') || (headingFont + ' + ' + bodyFont);

  // Fonts that only have one weight or need special handling
  const singleWeightFonts = ['Instrument Serif'];
  const serifFonts = ['Playfair Display', 'Fraunces', 'Instrument Serif'];
  const monoFonts = ['JetBrains Mono'];

  // Update label
  document.getElementById('font-label').textContent = decodeURIComponent(label) + '  |  ' + headingFont + ' + ' + bodyFont;

  // Load Google Fonts dynamically
  const hEncoded = encodeURIComponent(headingFont).replace(/%20/g, '+');
  const bEncoded = encodeURIComponent(bodyFont).replace(/%20/g, '+');
  const hWeights = singleWeightFonts.includes(headingFont) ? '' : ':wght@300;500;700';
  const bWeights = singleWeightFonts.includes(bodyFont) ? '' : ':wght@300;400;600';

  const link = document.createElement('link');
  link.rel = 'stylesheet';
  link.href = 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family='
    + hEncoded + hWeights + '&family='
    + bEncoded + bWeights + '&display=swap';
  document.head.appendChild(link);

  // Apply fonts once loaded
  link.onload = applyFonts;
  // Also apply immediately in case fonts are cached
  setTimeout(applyFonts, 100);
  setTimeout(applyFonts, 500);

  function applyFonts() {
    const hFallback = serifFonts.includes(headingFont) ? 'serif' : monoFonts.includes(headingFont) ? 'monospace' : 'sans-serif';
    const bFallback = serifFonts.includes(bodyFont) ? 'serif' : monoFonts.includes(bodyFont) ? 'monospace' : 'sans-serif';
    const hFamily = "'" + headingFont + "', " + hFallback;
    const bFamily = "'" + bodyFont + "', " + bFallback;

    document.querySelectorAll('.heading-font').forEach(el => {
      el.style.fontFamily = hFamily;
    });
    document.querySelectorAll('.body-font').forEach(el => {
      el.style.fontFamily = bFamily;
    });

    // Also apply to elements by their CSS class
    document.querySelectorAll('.hero-title-v2, .hero-subtitle-v2 span, .feature-card-v2 h3, .feature-card-v2 p + p').forEach(el => {
      el.style.fontFamily = hFamily;
    });
    document.querySelectorAll('.feature-card-v2 p:first-of-type').forEach(el => {
      el.style.fontFamily = bFamily;
    });
  }

  // Initialize AOS
  AOS.init({ duration: 1000, easing: 'ease-out-cubic', once: true, offset: 50 });

  // Parallax
  window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
    const hero = document.querySelector('.hero-image');
    if (hero) {
      hero.style.transform = 'translateY(' + window.pageYOffset * 0.3 + 'px)';
    }
  });

  // Card mouse effects
  document.querySelectorAll('.feature-card-v2').forEach(card => {
    card.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
      const rect = card.getBoundingClientRect();
      const x = e.clientX - rect.left;
      const y = e.clientY - rect.top;
      const rotateX = (y - rect.height / 2) / 20;
      const rotateY = (rect.width / 2 - x) / 20;
      card.style.transform = `translateY(-10px) scale(1.02) perspective(1000px) rotateX(${rotateX}deg) rotateY(${rotateY}deg)`;
    });
    card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { card.style.transform = ''; });
  });
</script>
